document_data.caption: Ragnoth of the Zhentarim.
document_data.name: Ragnoth
document_data.mainbody: '''Ragnoth''' was a [[wizard]] and member of the [[Zhentarim]] inhabiting [[Snowmantle]] in [[Daggerdale]] during the  mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He was a cold and methodical individual.
document_data.Description: He stood {{SI|5'10"|ft-in}} tall and slender. He almost always wore black [[robe]]s.
document_data.Activities: ''Circa'' [[1369 DR]], Ragnoth was in command of the Zhentarim and [[Zhentilar]] occupying Snowmantle.
document_data.Possessions: He carried a ''[[wand of polymorphing]]'' and ''[[rod of alertness]]''.
document_data.Abilities: Ragnoth memorized the following [[spell]]sâ€”''[[alarm]]'', ''[[change self]]'', ''[[chill touch]]'', ''[[detect magic]]'', ''[[friends]]'', ''[[light]]'', ''[[magic missile]]'', ''[[sleep]]'', ''[[spider climb]]'', ''[[wall of fog]]'', ''[[ESP]]'', ''[[blur]]'', ''[[invisibility]]'', ''[[Melf's acid arrow]]'', ''[[mirror image]]'', ''[[strength]]'', ''[[wizard lock]]'', ''[[blink]]'', ''[[explosive runes]]'', ''[[hold person]]'', ''[[lightning bolt]]'', ''[[protection from good]]'', ''[[spectral force]]'', ''[[wraithform]]'', ''[[dig]]'', ''[[hallucinatory terrain]]'', ''[[polymorph other]]'', ''[[wall of fire]]'', ''[[conjure elemental]]'', ''[[stone shape]]'', ''[[teleport]]'', and ''[[transmute mud to rock]]''.
